title: IS_BIGMAP_FULL
content:
0x66EE14B2// IsBigmapFull
BOOL IS_BIGMAP_FULL();Returns: Returns true if the full map is currently revealed on the minimap.
Use IsBigmapActive to check if the minimap is currently expanded or in it's normal state.Examples:LuaC#local expanded = IsBigmapActive()
local fullMap = IsBigmapFull()
print("The minimap is currently " .. (expanded and "expanded" or "normal size") .. " and the full map is currently " .. (fullMap and "revealed" or "not revealed") .. ".")
codeBlocks:
local expanded = IsBigmapActive()
local fullMap = IsBigmapFull()
